name: BUFFet
description: It's that time again.....  a threat to humanity has appeared once again. Four of the greatest heroes within distinct culinary disciplines have joined the fray in an effort to put a stop to this evil. They find themselves trapped in an enemy domain expansion that places our heroes inside what looks to be a giant refrigerator...? Fight against these wicked food monsters and attempt to make your way out of this living nightmare.  It's a buffet out here and only with your help may we hope to escape this madness.  In pizza, we crust.
